description: NamedResourcesAttribute is a combination of an attribute name and its value.

intSlice.description: IntSliceValue is an array of 64-bit integers.

name.description: Name is unique identifier among all resource instances managed by the driver on the node. It must be a DNS subdomain.

stringSlice.description: StringSliceValue is an array of strings.

version.description: VersionValue is a semantic version according to semver.org spec 2.0.0.
